name: Tanmay Kumar
title: Oops! I did it again...
text: I’ll be honest with my review and say that the product I received was not what I thought I had ordered. But I was wrong, very wrong...  I highly recommend it. You won’t regret purchasing this mini fantastic box cutter. Simply the best!

name: Henry Markwood
title: Fancy but not like old schools
text: I was surprised at how difficult it was to find a box cutter with good reviews. I just needed something small to keep at my desk for occasional use. This opens boxes but it's very tiny. Even having read the item description, I was still surprised.

name: Tom Holland
title: Amazing Products...
text: I absolutely love the products! I love that the fast delivery service. Very satisfied with this purchase, they come in a sturdy zip-up case. I’ve only had them for a month now but I’m super impressed with the quality for the price! And the color is absolutely adorable! Thank you so much.
